entities.name: cold
entities.description: The cold is mentioned as something that has been experienced by someone in the past, specifically on a broom only once before. This implies that it's not a common occurrence for them.

entities.name: broom
entities.description: The broom is mentioned as something that someone has used to fly, specifically on one occasion when they had the cold. This implies that the broom is a tool or vehicle for flying.

entities.name: Quidditch
entities.description: The Quidditch is mentioned as something that takes place during which someone has had the cold. This implies that Quidditch is a significant event or activity in this context.

relationships.description: The cold was experienced on the broom, implying that the person had the cold while flying on the broom.
The cold occurred during Quidditch, implying that the person had the cold while participating in or watching Quidditch.
